mapper.select: select m.* ,u.avatar,u.`name` from czp_message m left join czp_user u on u.id=m.from_id where m.to_id in (#{fromId},#{toId}) and m.from_id in (#{fromId},#{toId})

select u.* from czp_user u where u.id in (select DISTINCT m.to_id as id from czp_message m where m.from_id=#{id} and m.type="user" union select DISTINCT m.from_id as id from czp_message m where m.to_id=#{id} and m.type="user") order by u.id
